home.Name: Aitthisone
home.Description: I have been a web designer for over five years, and I have the know-how and creativity to create websites.

Services.head: My Services
Services.Description-u: UX/UI Design focuses on creating intuitive, engaging digital experiences. UX (User Experience) enhances usability, while UI (User Interface) designs the visual elements, ensuring seamless interaction between users and products.
Services.Description-f: Frontend Developers craft the look and feel of websites and apps you interact with. They use code to bring designs to life, making your digital experience seamless and enjoyable.
Services.Description-a: At Appellation, we specialize in crafting captivating digital experiences. Our Frontend Developers breathe life into designs, ensuring seamless interaction for users. Elevate your brand with our expertise.
Services.Description-c: At Srervice, we not only excel in crafting captivating digital experiences, but also customize our services to suit your unique needs. Elevate your brand with tailored frontend development solutions

Project.t-Description: Website about Construction 3D Design and service.
Project.i-Description: Website about Safety Equipment product and services
Project.s-Description: Website Designer Service about Cleaning Product Karcher Brand
Project.v-Description: A website about painting services, road construction and aluminum signs

About.Description: Pioneering Web Elegance: Elevate your online presence with the finesse of web development craftsmanship. It is not just coding; it is a symphony of digital artistry! Advancements in Real-Time Web Solutions: Your website should evolve as swiftly as the digital landscape. Stay proactive with real-time innovations, ensuring your online platform remains at the forefront of user experience! Mastering the Web with Creative Precision: Harness the power of creativity and precision in every line of code. Crafting exceptional web experiences is not just a task; it is a testament to your dedication to excellence!

Education History.Description-p: Since 2016, my journey as a programmer has been marked by relentless dedication to honing my craft. Continuously advancing my development skills, I embrace challenges as opportunities for growth. With an unwavering commitment to excellence, I strive to surpass current capabilities and pave the way for future success in the ever-evolving tech landscape
Education History.titel-name-r: Bachelor's program in General Management - Rattana institute of business administration
Education History.Description-r: Armed with a Bachelor's degree in General Management, I possess a comprehensive understanding of organizational dynamics and strategic planning. This academic foundation, coupled with real-world experience, equips me to navigate multifaceted challenges and drive sustainable growth in diverse business environments
Education History.Description-s: While working, I undertook a safety training course for labor in Thailand, augmenting my skills and knowledge to prioritize workplace safety and compliance.in 4 courses
Education History.Description-e: Developed multiple high-traffic APIs using Node.js and Express. Improved system stability through rigorous testing and code reviews.
